input_email_body:
Subject: Incorrect Invoice Received

I have received an invoice with higher fees than expected, and upon review, the discrepancy still exists My name is Maria Gonzalez.. It might be due to an error in the billing system You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Could you please look into this matter and provide a corrected invoice as soon as possible? I appreciate your prompt attention to this issue and look forward to hearing from you soon.
